document_data.image: Rare and Fine Seashell Remedies map.png
document_data.name: Rare and Fine Seashell Remedies
document_data.mainbody: '''Rare and Fine Seashell Remedies''' was a shop that dealt in medicinal tinctures, located in the [[Seaglimpse]] neighborhood of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop was nestled by the city walls of the [[Ravens Bluff/Harbor District|Harbor District]], in a cluster of unnamed lanes often referred to as [[Gimble's Elbow]]. The so-called Elbow split from the wagonroad called [[the Front]] that ran along the Harbor District's shores. The [[The Silver Lady]] inn was located to the northwest of the Seashell Remedies, the [[Farspice Trading Company]] stood to its south, and further to the south, the [[Gates of the Watchful Raven]] led into the city, away from the harbors.
document_data.Services: Rare and Fine Seashell Remedies sold highly-alcoholic liquor [[cordial]]s that were advertised as remedies and medicines.
